item.title: Dark secret
item.description: The darker the brew, the closer to the truth.

item.title: Workplace drama
item.description: In this too long to read story, A and B navigate the workpace drama around C. The real intrigue has to do with E, but will we ever learn what happend between B and E?

item.title: Midwest goodbye
item.description: Talk soon! You too! Take care! You as well! Bye for now! Bye! Catch you later! Later! See ya! See ya soon!

item.title: Cook-off
item.description: LLMs meet up and cook together. B got nerdy, defining a firm scoring schedule.
